author: martin
msg: If, as suggested by ../../../README.BUILD_ALPHA, you set the --with-debug
switch to configure, you ended up with broken sed files because of this
typo (an extra newline). How come nobody realized this yet?

author: trawick
msg: Change the test for ranlib so that we end up with RANLIB=true instead
of RANLIB=: in our makefiles when there is no ranlib.  OS/390 make

author: trawick
msg: include <arpa/inet.h> for ntohl() et al (some platforms
follow the Single Unix Spec and define them there)

author: trawick
msg: allow ap_open_stderr() to be called with cont == NULL (for
now at least) so that Apache can log messages to stderr on

author: rbb
msg: Fix a bug pthreads cross process locks.  This was missed in the big patch
to do this last week sometime.
